effect.black_white: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages. Halves the user’s weight; this effect does not stack.
effect.black_2_white_2: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages. Halves the user’s weight; this effect does not stack.

short_effect.black_white: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages and halves the user’s weight.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages and halves the user’s weight.

flavor_text.black_white: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.
